atk-vin02a414:1_1: āpajjati, desento sacittako vuṭṭhāti. Yaṁkiñci sañcicca āpajjanto sacittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a414:1_2: tiṇavatthārakena vuṭṭhahanto acittako vuṭṭhāti. Pubbe vuttameva tiṇavatthārakena
atk-vin02a414:1_3: vuṭṭhahanto acittako āpajjati, acittako vuṭṭhāti. Itaraṁ desento sacittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a414:1_4: sacittako vuṭṭhāti. ‘‘Dhammadānaṁ karomī’’ti padasodhammādīni karonto kusalacitto
atk-vin02a414:1_5: āpajjati, ‘‘buddhānaṁ anusāsaniṁ karomī’’ti udaggacitto desento kusalacitto vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a414:1_6: Domanassiko hutvā desento akusalacitto vuṭṭhāti, tiṇavatthārakena niddāgatova vuṭṭhahanto
atk-vin02a414:1_7: abyākatacitto vuṭṭhāti. Bhiṁsāpanādīni katvā ‘‘buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ karomī’’ti somanassiko
atk-vin02a414:1_8: desento akusalacitto āpajjati, kusalacitto vuṭṭhāti. Domanassikova desento akusalacitto
atk-vin02a414:1_9: vuṭṭhāti, vuttanayeneva tiṇavatthārakena vuṭṭhahanto abyākatacitto vuṭṭhāti. Niddokkantasamaye
atk-vin02a414:1_10: sahagāraseyyaṁ āpajjanto abyākatacitto āpajjati, vuttanayeneva panettha ‘‘kusalacitto
atk-vin02a414:2: Paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādi pubbe vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a414:3: 473.Cattāro pārājikā katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādīsu ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato yaṁ yaṁ samuṭṭhānaṁ yassa yassa labbhati, taṁ sabbaṁ vuttameva hoti.
